note: Bella is the Songhai name for Ikelan (a caste of Tuareg). They speak a Nilo-Saharan language. Since it isn't covered by other values, this must be a Songhay language. Koyraboro Sennai (ses) is spoken by 300-430,000 and not matched by any of the other entries. Soninke is spoken by 2.1 million, but matched by another entry.
